Role 1 - RBC (1202020)
Knowledge of CM business is bonus but not required. Candidate will be responsible for - Developing JMS interfaces to our client repository system, which is a database
- Encapsulate JDBC calls into JMS calls
- Expose JMS as a web service onto the Enterprise Service Bus (ESB)
- Process all service requests and return acknowledgement
Role 2 Citibank
We are seeking C++ Software Developers with a BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, with 3-5 years of financial services industry experience to support a credit risk technology organization. Strong programming skills in C++, Java, and SQL; knowledge of Perl and/or Excel a plus. Ideal candidate will have an aptitude for math and analytical problem solving. Experience in distributed computing and/or financial modeling a strong plus. Responsibilities include: all phases of software development on product, analytics calculation engine, and distributed computation infrastructure; investigation and resolution of client issues; working with Risk managers to specify and design new functionality; interfacing with other groups in the firm.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design and develop credit risk platform components in distributed grid environment
• Provide end to end platform integration testing including developing regression test scripts
• Provide application support for the OTC counterparty credit risk system
• Provide support to the Credit Risk Analytics for analyzing numerical problems
CANDIDATE QUALIFICATIONS
• Minimum 3-5 years of hands on software development experiences in financial services organization
• Strong C++ design and development skills with knowledge of design patterns and application architecture, experience with multi-threaded programming is a plus
• Java/J2EE design and development experience with Web applications and Databases is highly desired
• Proven analytical and problem solving skills
• Must be able to communicate and interact effectively with clients, project manager and IT stakeholders
Priyanka Mehandiratta
Resource Manager

Toronto, Ontario M5J2RB
